data.text:
@GovCanHealth Drop pre travel testing!

@CPHO_Canada has said publicly, multiple times in the past few weeks.. its a waste of time, money & resources at this point but if @JustinTrudeau was listening to Tam, that would mean the Fed Gov was actually "following the science" instead of the money.

@GovCanHealth So if I drive over the border next week, get a rapid test. Then go shopping, out to a game, tourist attractions then drive back in a few hours. What does that rapid test prove? That i crossed over without Covid?  Day trips to 48 hours shouldn't need a test. @CPHO_Canada
@GovCanHealth Hypocritical cunts. Drop the pre-arrival testing. Your opportunistic politicizing of this is disgusting

@GovCanHealth @CanBorder I need to pickup an order too large and time sensitive to ship and will be gone for five (5)  hours. Would be nice if I didnâ€™t have to stop in Buffalo to pay for a $90cdn test to go home.
@GovCanHealth @TravelGoC Stop this testing nonsense to get back into my own country
@grimis101 @GovCanHealth Before May 8th would be great too
